translations.chinese: 陳平反間既行，羽果疑亞父。
translations.english: Chen Ping's reverse espionage having succeeded, Xiang Yu indeed suspected Prime Minister Fan.
Prime Minister Fan was greatly angered and left. He fell ill and died.

translations.chinese: 五月，將軍紀信曰：「事急矣！
translations.english: In the fifth month, General Ji Xin said: "The situation is urgent!
I request to deceive Chu so we can break out."

translations.chinese: 於是陳平夜出女子東門二千餘人，楚因四面擊 之。
translations.english: So Chen Ping at night sent out over 2,000 women through the east gate. Chu then attacked from all four sides.
